articles.author: Richard Connor
articles.title: Germany updates: Economy shrinks more than expected - DW
articles.description: Europe's largest economy has shrunk, with industrial production and construction weaker than first thought. Meanwhile, Berlin is being urged to recognize a Palestinian state. Follow DW for the latest.
articles.content:
Germany's gross domestic product has fallen by 0.3% in the second quarter of 2025 compared with the first, showing Europe's largest economy losing momentum.
